name: SCHIZO Chapter 1
description:
summary 

This game is about a schizo who forgets his past and is slowly remembering  it as he goes on wacky adventures 

Hey so this my first "REAL" game so I hope you like it it's only a beta but I think it came out ok. Chapter 2 is in development so if you like it you won't have to wait to long for more. I'm going to make remaster of each beta eventually and after that the final version of the game so that's about it if you want to help in the development join the discord server or follow me on twitter for updates I hope you enjoy
